infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodyassistant: An artificial body made entirely from metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodycaptain: An artificial body made entirely from metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodymedic: An artificial body made entirely from metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodymechanic: An artificial body made entirely from metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodysecurity: An artificial body made entirely from metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.cyberbodyengineer: An artificial body made entirely from metal.
infotexts.entitydescription.cybercoreassistant: An incomplete metallic chassis. It seems to emanate an aura of incompetence.
infotexts.entitydescription.cybercorecaptain: An incomplete metallic chassis. Adorned with an admiral's crest, there is a strange sense of authority commanded by this vacant shell.
infotexts.entitydescription.cybercoremedic: An incomplete metallic chassis. A sickly aroma of blood is present, thinly veiled by sterile chemicals.
infotexts.entitydescription.cybercoremechanic: An incomplete metallic chassis. The faint sound of gears grinding can be heard from within.
infotexts.entitydescription.cybercoresecurity: An incomplete metallic chassis. Sporadic shockwaves shoot through the cold, hard, steel.
infotexts.entitydescription.cybercoreengineer: An incomplete metallic chassis. You can feel sharp jolts of electicity running through it.
